verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>Go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H935>them,<s%> and bring them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> and give them <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2262>Habazziniah,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and all his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites;<s%>

and I <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> into the <S%H3957>room<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3012>Igdaliah,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which was <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H3957>room<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> which was <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3957>room<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H5592>threshold.<s%>

I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H3563>cups;<s%> and I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8354>them,<s%> Drink <S%H3196>wine!<s%>

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine;<s%> for <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> our <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>us,<s%> saying, You shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine,<s%> neither <S%H1121>you,<s%> nor your sons, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%>

neither shall you <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> nor <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> nor have <S%H3117>any;<s%> but all your days you shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents;<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> in which you <S%H1481>live.<s%>

We have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> our <S%H1>father,<s%> in all that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8354>us,<s%> to drink no <S%H3196>wine<s%> all our <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H802>we,<s%> our wives, our <S%H1121>sons,<s%> or our <S%H1323>daughters;<s%>
nor to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> for us to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%> neither have we <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> nor <S%H7704>field,<s%> nor <S%H2233>seed:<s%>
but we have lived <S%H3427>in<s%> <S%H168>tents,<s%> and have <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> according to all that <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> commanded <S%H6680>us.<s%>

But it <S%H5019>happened,<s%> when Nebuchadnezzar <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H776>land,<s%> that we <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians;<s%> so we <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Will you not <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to my <S%H1697>words?<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> are <S%H6965>performed;<s%> and to this <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8085>none,<s%> for they obey their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment:<s%> but I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H7925>you,<s%> rising up early and <S%H1696>speaking;<s%> and you have not listened to <S%H8085>me.<s%>

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> also to you all my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H7725>Return<s%> now every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H3212>don't<s%> go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3427>them,<s%> and you shall dwell in the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers:<s%> but you have not <S%H5186>inclined<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> nor listened to <S%H8085>me.<s%>

Because the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5971>them,<s%> but this people has not listened to <S%H8085>me;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> I will bring on <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and on all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H1696>them;<s%> because I have spoken to <S%H8085>them,<s%> but they have not heard; and I have <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H6030>them,<s%> but they have not answered.

<S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> Because you have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H8104>kept<s%> all his <S%H4687>precepts,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> according to all that he commanded <S%H6680>you;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> shall not <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H3117>forever.<s%>
